channel.title: Our Blue Snowflakes - by Azure Onyxscore [Ambient? Pianos, Upbeat]
channel.description:
My first track of 2018
https://soundcloud.com/azureonyx/our-blue-snowflakes
I wanted to get a track released for 2018, despite the amount of people leaving the community... it's just sad. Mark your calendars for the 25th of January for the new update.
I was originally gonna upload this for Christmas. However, I had other projects holding me back. Plus, the track wasn't good by my standards.

item.title: Our Blue Snowflakes - by Azure Onyxscore [Ambient? Pianos, Upbeat]

item.title: Our Blue Snowflakes - by Azure Onyxscore [Ambient? Pianos, Upbeat]
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
I liked it! I wasn’t really actively listening cuz I was checking my twitter feed but the melodies kept me interested throughout. The song didn’t get boring at all and I quite enjoyed… thanks for the sweet music!

Read full topic
item.source: Our Blue Snowflakes - by Azure Onyxscore [Ambient? Pianos, Upbeat]
